about_the_game:
P.R.D.A. is a roguelike deck building game, you're going to play a special agent of P.R.D.A., hunt down all the twisted creatures around the world. collect cards and items to build your deck, put together the tarots that you find to build even more advantage. Be careful about your choices, because the tarots also going to make your enemies stronger. BUT also don't worry about losing, because there are chances that every enemy you beat is going to be the resource in next mission, which you can use to make yourself more powerful. Try to accomplish your mission, agent. It's going to be a tough adventure.

Allocate attribute points based on your play style

Use the Twisted-Souls you harvest from your enemies to customize your attributes on mission start.

Loot, fight, retreat

Defeat enemies and choose a skill and an item from the drops to optimize your deck as you play.

Use different combinations of tarot cards to crush your enemies, or... be crushed by them...

Switch tarot positions in real time to deal with different situations.

Feeling pressured to move on? Look for safe exit to save strength for next mission.

Make your own exclusive cards

Use the materials accumulated in each mission to create your own cards.

Challenge powerful BOSSES strengthened by your own

Each tarot card has different special effects in the upright and reversed state, every choice you make comes with risks.
